mapper.select: SELECT pm_subcontractor.id AS 'subcontractor_id', pm_subcontractor.name AS 'subcontractor_name', pm_subcontractor.company_id, pm_company.name AS 'company_name' FROM pm_subcontractor LEFT JOIN pm_company ON pm_company.id = pm_subcontractor.company_id LEFT JOIN pm_subcontractor_phone_number ON pm_subcontractor_phone_number.subcontractor_id = pm_subcontractor.id LEFT JOIN pm_phone_number ON pm_phone_number.id = pm_subcontractor_phone_number.phone_number_id

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT pm_subcontractor.id) FROM pm_subcontractor LEFT JOIN pm_company ON pm_company.id = pm_subcontractor.company_id LEFT JOIN pm_subcontractor_phone_number ON pm_subcontractor_phone_number.subcontractor_id = pm_subcontractor.id LEFT JOIN pm_phone_number ON pm_phone_number.id = pm_subcontractor_phone_number.phone_number_id

SELECT pm_subcontractor.id AS 'subcontractor_id', pm_subcontractor.name AS 'subcontractor_name', pm_subcontractor.positions, pm_subcontractor.titles, pm_phone_number.phone_number FROM pm_subcontractor LEFT JOIN pm_subcontractor_phone_number ON pm_subcontractor.id = pm_subcontractor_phone_number.subcontractor_id LEFT JOIN pm_phone_number ON pm_subcontractor_phone_number.phone_number_id = pm_phone_number.id

SELECT pm_subcontractor.id AS 'subcontractor_id', pm_subcontractor.name AS 'subcontractor_name', pm_subcontractor.id_card_number, pm_subcontractor.positions, pm_subcontractor.titles, pm_subcontractor.create_time AS 'subcontractor_create_time', pm_subcontractor.update_time AS 'subcontractor_update_time', pm_company.id AS 'company_id', pm_company.name AS 'company_name', pm_company.parent_id AS 'company_parent_id', pm_phone_number.id AS 'phone_number_id', pm_phone_number.phone_number FROM pm_subcontractor LEFT JOIN pm_company ON pm_subcontractor.company_id = pm_company.id LEFT JOIN pm_subcontractor_phone_number ON pm_subcontractor.id = pm_subcontractor_phone_number.subcontractor_id LEFT JOIN pm_phone_number ON pm_subcontractor_phone_number.phone_number_id = pm_phone_number.id WHERE pm_subcontractor.id = #{id}
